name: Old Age Samman Allowance
description: Monthly allowance (₹3,000 as of Jan 2024) for Haryana residents aged ≥60, family income ≤₹300,000/year, and not receiving any government pension.

name: Lado Lakshmi Yojana
description: Monthly stipend (Rs. 2,100) for female residents aged between 18-60 from BPL families, with no member in government employment or paying income tax.

occupation: Unemployed / Household women from BPL families

name: Ladli Social Security Allowance
description: Rs. 3,000/month for families with only daughters, parent aged >=45, and family income <= Rs.200,000/year, for 15 years.

name: Pension to Widows & Destitute Women
description: Rs. 3,000/month pension for women aged >=18, domiciled in Haryana >=1 year, income <Rs. 300,000/year, widowed/destitute.

occupation: Widows / Unemployed or economically dependent women

name: Financial Assistance to Destitute Children
description: Monthly allowance (~Rs. 2,100 for first child) for destitute Haryana children aged <21, parental income <= Rs.200,000/year.

name: Old Age Pension
description: Rs. 1,500/month pension for elderly residents-women aged >=58 years and men aged >=65-income <= Rs.60,000/year, limited land holdings.

name: Financial Assistance to Widows & Destitute Women
description: R. 1,500/month for widows or destitute/unmarried women (unmarried >=30, widows <58), income <= Rs.60,000/year.

name: Financial Assistance to Dependent Children
description: Monthly assistance for children under 21 who are orphaned or whose parents are incapacitated, income <= Rs.60,000/year.

name: Financial Assistance to Disabled Persons
description: Rs. 1,500/month for persons with >=50% disability (any level mental disability), income <= Rs.60,000/year.

name: Old Age Assistance
description: Monthly financial assistance: Rs.2,000 for ages 60-69 and Rs.2,500 for 70+, with additional Rs.500 for SC/ST/minorities. Eligibility: Delhi resident >=5 years, annual family income <= Rs.100,000.

name: Old Age Pension Scheme (Renewed)
description: Rs.2,500/month for ages 60-69 and Rs.3,000 for 70+, Delhi resident >=5 years, family income <Rs.100,000. Applies to non-pensioners.

name: Disability Pension Scheme
description: Rs.2,500/month pension for persons with >=40-50% disability, Delhi resident >=5 years, family income <Rs.100,000, not receiving other pensions.

name: Pension for Women in Distress
description: RS.2,500/month pension for women in distress (widows, deserted, disabled), under the Delhi Pension Scheme for Women in Distress, annual income below Rs.100,000.

name: Old Age Pension (Vridha Pension)
description: Rs.1,000/month (Rs. 12,000 annually) for residents aged >=60, income <= Rs.46,080/year (rural) or <= Rs.56,460/year (urban), not receiving other pensions.

name: Widow Pension Scheme
description: Rs.1,000/month for widows aged >=18, family income <= Rs.200,000/year, not receiving other pensions.

name: Disability Pension Scheme
description: Rs.1,000/month for persons aged >=18 with >=40% disability, income <= Rs.46,080/year (rural) or <= Rs.56,460/year (urban), not receiving other pension.

name: Leprosy Pension Scheme
description: Rs.3,000/month for persons of any age with leprosy-related disability, income <= Rs.46,080/year (rural) or <= Rs.56,460/year (urban), not receiving other pension.

name: Chief Minister Old Age Pension
description: Rs.1,000/month for women >=55 years and men >=58, annual family income <= Rs.48,000, Rajasthan resident, DBT via SSO/E-Mitra.

name: Rajasthan Widow Pension Scheme (Mukhyamantri Ekal Naari Samman)
description: Rs.500-1,500/month for widowed/divorced/single women (18+), increasing with age-Rs.500 at 18-55, Rs.750 at 55-60, Rs.1,000 at 60-75, Rs.1,500 at 75+, family income <= Rs.48,000.

name: Social Security Disability & Leprosy Pension
description: Rs.500/month (<=75 years) or Rs.750/month (75+) for persons with disability/leprosy, income <= Rs.60,000/year, Rajasthan resident.

name: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Yojana (IGNWPS)
description: Rs.1,000/month widows aged 40-<75, Rs.1,500 for >=75, BPL families, Rajasthan resident, under NSAP alignment.

name: Gujarat Ganga Swarupa Yojana
description: Rs.1,250/month pension for widowed women (18+) in Gujarat; income <= Rs.120,000/year rural or <= Rs.150,000/year urban; DBT via offline application.

name: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (IGNOAPS)
description: Rs.1,000/month (60-79 yrs) or Rs.1,250/month (80+) for Gujarat residents >=60 yrs, BPL (rural income <Rs.120k or urban <Rs.150k), DBT via Mamlatdar.

name: Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme (IGNDPS)
description: Pension (central Rs.300-Rs.750) for persons with >=80% disability aged 18-79, BPL in Gujarat, DBT via local Mamlatdar.

name: Mukhyamantri Vridhajan Pension Yojana (MVPY)
description: Rs.400/month for residents >=60 yrs and Rs.500 for >=80 yrs (BPL), not receiving any other pension.

name: Laxmibai Social Security Pension Scheme (State Widow Pension)
description: Rs.400/month for widows >=18 yrs (BPL), age 40-79 for central component.

name: Mukhya Mantri Kanya Utthan Yojana (Bihar)
description: Incentives for the education and welfare of girl children in Bihar.

name: Bihar State Disability Pension Scheme (BSDP)
description: Rs.400/month for persons with >=40% disability (any age/BPL), rs.500/month if >=80 yrs.

name: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (IGNOAPS)
description: Central pension Rs.400/month (60-79 yrs), Rs.500 (>=80 yrs) for BPL elderly.

name: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme (IGNWPS)
description: Rs.400/month for widows aged 40-79 from BPL families under central NSAP.

name: Old Age Pension (Vridhavastha Pension)
description: Rs.750/month for ages 60-69 with annual family income <= Rs.35,000; Rs.1,300/month for 70+ (no income limit); offline application via welfare offices.

name: State Widow/Single Woman Pension
description: Rs.1,150/month for widows, deserted, or single women with annual income <= Rs.35,000; no minimum age specified.

name: Disability Relief Allowance
description: Rs.1,000/month for 40-69% disability and Rs.1,500/month for >=70% or mental disability or age 70+, with income <= Rs.35,000/year.

name: Rehabilitation Allowance for Lepers
description: Rs.850/month (Rs.1,500 for 70+) for leprosy patients not in govt service, no age or income limit.

name: Transgender Pension Scheme
description: Rs.850/month (Rs.1,500 for 70+) for state-certified transgender persons, no income or age limit.

name: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (IGNOAPS)
description: Central pension Rs. 1,000/month (60-79 yrs) or Rs.1,500/month (70+ per state update) for BPL elderly in HP under NSAP.

name: Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme (IGNDPS)
description: Central Rs.300 + state aid up to Rs.1,500 for persons aged 18-79 with >=80% disability under NSAP.

name: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme (IGNWPS)
description: Central Rs.300 + state aid total Rs.1,500/month for widows aged 40-79 under NSAP.

name: Kushal Konwar Briddha Pension Scheme
description: Rs.250/month DBT for elderly Assam residents aged>=60; excludes those receiving other govt schemes, govt-employed children's parents, or taxpayers with income >Rs.250,000/year.

name: IGNOAPS (National Old Age Pension)
description: Rs.200/month for ages 60-79; Rs.500/month for >=80, for BPL elderly Assam residents under NSAP.

name: IGNWPS (National Widow Pension)
description: Rs.300/month for widows >=40-79; Rs.500/month for >=80, Assam BPL widows under NSAP.

name: IGNDPS (National Disability Pension)
description: Rs.300/month up to age 79, Rs.500/month for >=80, for persons with >=80% disability and BPL, Assam residents under NSAP.

name: National Family Benefit Scheme (NFBS)
description: One-time lump sum Rs.20,000 to bereaved BPL households on death of a breadwinner aged 18-64.

name: Annapurna Scheme
description: 10 kg free rice/month for elderly BPL individuals not covered under IGNOAPS.

name: Atal Pension Yojana (Assam)
description: Voluntary contributory pension 18-40 yrs unorganised sector; monthly pension Rs.1,000-5,000 at age 60 based on contributions.

name: ABOCWWB Disability Pension
description: Rs.2,000/month + Rs.100/year service for registered construction workers permanently disabled; one-time ex-gratia up to Rs.300,000.

name: Chief Minister Pension Scheme
description: Rs.350/month for elderly aged >=60 and abandoned women (>=18), permanent residents under BPL.

name: Pleasant Support Scheme (State Widow Pension)
description: Rs.350/month for widows and deserted women aged >=18 from BPL families.

name: Social Security Pension Scheme (Disability)
description: Rs.350/month for disabled persons aged >=18 with >=40% disability, and dwarf persons BPL.

name: IGNOAPS (National Old Age Pension)
description: Rs.350/month for elderly aged 60-79; Rs.650 for >=80, BPL residents under NSAP.

name: IGNWPS (National Widow Pension)
description: Rs.350/month for widows aged 40-79, BPL under NSAP.

name: IGNDPS (National Disability Pension)
description: Rs.500/month for persons aged 18-79 with >=80% disability (Rs.300 centre + Rs.200 state).

name: Mukhyamantri Nirman Shramik Pension Sahayata
description: Rs.1,500/month pension for construction workers >=60 registered >=10 yrs; Rs.700 for widows.

name: National Family Benefit Scheme (NFBS)
description: One-time Rs.20,000 for BPL family on death of breadwinner aged 18-59.

name: Dayanand Social Security Scheme (DSSS)
description: Monthly pension for vulnerable groups: Rs.2,000 for senior citizens and disabled adults; Rs.2,500 for single women/widows and children with disability.

name: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme (IGNWPS)
description: Rs.2,500/month under DSSS for single women (including widows/divorcees) aged 18+ and up to senior category transition.

name: Senior Citizen Pension (DSSS subcategory)
description: Rs.2,000/month for Goa residents aged 60+, under DSSS.

name: Disability Pension (DSSS subcategory)
description: Rs.2,000/month for adults and Rs.2,500/month for children with disabilities, under DSSS.

name: Goa Building & Other Construction Workers Pension
description: Rs.300/month + Rs.10 per year of service after age 60 for registered construction workers.

name: Sarvajan Pension Scheme
description: Universal pension Rs.1,000/month for elderly (60+), widows (18+), disabled adults; age limit lowered to 50 for women and SC/ST.

name: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (IGNOAPS)
description: Rs.600/month (60-79 yrs) and Rs.700/month (80+ yrs) under NSAP for BPL elderly.

name: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme (IGNWPS)
description: Rs.600/month for widows aged 40-60 under NSAP for BPL families.

name: Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension (IGNDPS)
description: Rs.600/month for persons aged 40-60 with >=80% disability under NSAP for BPL.

name: State Social Security Pension Scheme
description: Rs.600/month for elderly (60+), widows (18+), disabled (>40%) and released bonded labourers with rural income <= Rs.10,500 or urban <= Rs.12,500.

name: Adim Janjati Pension Yojana
description: Rs.600/month for primitive tribal adults (18+) whose family members are not employed in govt or private sector.

name: Mukhyamantri Rajya Nirashrit Mahila Samman Pension
description: Rs.1,000/month for abandoned or single women (>=45) and widows (>=18), no other pension or govt job.

name: National Family Benefit Scheme (NFBS)
description: One-time Rs.20,000 to bereaved BPL family on death of primary breadwinner aged 18-65.

name: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (IGNOAPS)
description: Rs.1,200/month total (Rs.200 centre + Rs.1,000 state) for destitute elderly aged 60-79; Rs.1,200 total (Rs.500 centre + Rs.700 state) for 80+.

name: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme (IGNWPS)
description: Rs.1,200/month total (Rs.300 centre + Rs.900 state) for destitute widows aged >=40 years under BPL.

name: Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme (IGNDPS)
description: Rs.1,500/month total (Rs.300 centre + Rs.1,200 state) for persons aged >=18 with >=80% disability under BPL.

name: Differently Abled Pension Scheme (DAPS)
description: Rs.1,500/month for persons aged >=18 with >=40% disability; private/self-employed with income <= Rs.300,000/year are eligible.

name: Destitute Widow Pension Scheme (DWPS)
description: Rs.1,200/month for destitute widows aged >=18 with assets <= Rs.100,000.

name: Destitute/Deserted Wives Pension Scheme (DDWPS)
description: Rs.1,200/month for destitute divorced/deserted women aged >=30 (5 years separation certificate) with assets <= Rs.100,000.

name: Unmarried Poor Women Pension (UWP)
description: Rs.1,200/month for destitute unmarried women aged >=50 with assets <= Rs.100,000.

name: Chief Minister's Uzhavar Padhukappu Thittam (CMUPT) - Elderly Agricultural Laborer Pension
description: Rs.1,200/month for destitute agricultural laborers aged >=60 with assets <= Rs.100,000.

name: Sri Lankan Refugee Pension Schemes
description: Rs.1,200/month for old age/disability/widow/refugee unmarried women under specific refugee pensions.

name: Old Age Pension
description: Rs.1,500/month for residents aged >=60 (can apply at 59%), permanent Uttarakhand domicile, annual family income <= Rs.48,000 or BPL, not receiving other pensions.

name: Widow Pension
description: Rs.1,500/month for widows aged >=18 under state scheme, permanent resident, BPL or annual family income <= Rs.48,000, not receiving other pensions.

name: Disability Pension
description: Rs.1,500/month for persons aged >=18 with disability under state scheme, permanent resident, BPL or annual family income <= Rs.48,000.

name: Farmer Pension
description: Rs.1,500/month for farmers aged >=18 under state scheme; eligibility includes BPL/annual income limit and permanent residence.

name: West Bengal Jai Bangla Pension Scheme (Umbrella)
description: Rs.1,000/month pension under categories: Old Age, Widow, Disability, SC (Taposili Bandhu), ST (Jai Johar), Manabik, Farmer, Fishermen, Artisan/Weaver, Lok Prasar.

name: INDIRA GANDHI NATIONAL OLD AGE PENSION SCHEME (IGNOAPS)
description: Rs.400/month for BPL elderly 60-79; Rs.1,000/month for 80+ under NSAP.

name: INDIRA GANDHI NATIONAL WIDOW PENSION SCHEME (IGNWPS)
description: Rs.600/month for BPL widows aged 40-79 under NSAP.

name: INDIRA GANDHI NATIONAL DISABILITY PENSION SCHEME (IGNDPS)
description: Rs.600/month for BPL persons (18-79) with severe/multiple disabilities under NSAP.

name: NATIONAL FAMILY BENEFIT SCHEME (NFBS)
description: One-time Rs.40,000 lump-sum to BPL family on death of primary breadwinner aged 18-59.

name: Sandhya Suraksha Yojana
description: Rs.1,000/month pension for elderly >=65 with annual income <= Rs.20,000 and bank balance <= Rs.10,000; also includes discounted KSRTC travel, medical aid, NGO support.

name: Karnataka BOCW Pension Scheme
description: Rs.2,000-3,000/month pension for registered construction workers aged >=60, with >=3 years membership and income <= Rs.15,000/month, no concurrent pension.

name: Disability Pension (KBOCWWB)
description: Rs.2,000/month + ex-gratia up to Rs.2 Lakh for registered construction workers (18-60) with partial workplace disability.

name: Shravanbal Seva Rajya Nivrutti Vetan Yojana
description: Rs.600/month (Rs.200 central + Rs.400 state) for destitute senior citizens aged >=65 with annual family income <= Rs.21,000 or BPL, permanent Maharashtra resident >=15 years.

name: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (IGNOAPS)
description: Rs.600/month total (Rs.200 central + Rs.400 state top-up) for BPL elderly aged >= 65 under NSAP.

name: Sanjay Gandhi Niradhar Pension Scheme
description: Rs.1,500/month DBT for destitute persons-including elderly <65, widows, disabled, orphans, transgender, major illnesses; annual family income <= Rs.21,000, Maharashtra resident.

name: Maharashtra Widow Pension (IGNWPS / State)
description: Rs.600/month (central + state) for widows aged 40-65 under IGNWPS/State widow scheme.

name: Maharashtra BOCW Pension Scheme
description: Rs.12,000/year (~RS.1,000/month) for registered construction workers aged >=60; annual renewal required; excludes ESI/EPF beneficiaries; surviving spouse eligible.

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Urban)
description: Affordable housing scheme for urban poor with subsidy on home loans.

name: National Scholarship Portal (Post-Matric)
description: Scholarships for post-matric students from economically weaker sections.

name: Stand Up India Scheme
description: Loans for SC/ST and women entrepreneurs to start businesses.

name: Atal Pension Yojana
description: Pension scheme for unorganised sector workers.

name: PM Vishwakarma Yojana
description: Empowers traditional artisans and craftspeople with tools and skill training.

name: Ayushman Bharat Yojana
description: Health insurance of up to ₹5 lakh for poor and vulnerable families.

name: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (NAPS)
description: Training and stipend support for youth in industrial apprenticeships.
